title: Video Viewing Task
description: Watch a promotional video and provide feedback

proofRequirements.details: Provide a brief summary of the video content and your opinion (minimum 50 words)

title: Mobile App Installation
description: Download and install our mobile application

proofRequirements.details: Provide a screenshot of the installed app on your device

title: Social Media Sharing
description: Share our content on your social media platforms

proofRequirements.details: Provide links to your social media posts or screenshots

title: Product Review Task
description: Write a detailed review of our product or service

proofRequirements.details: Write a comprehensive review of at least 200 words including pros, cons, and recommendations
Provide screenshots showing you've followed our accounts

title: User-Generated Video Content
description: Create and upload a video featuring our product

proofRequirements.details: Upload your video to a platform and provide the link, or upload directly to our platform

title: Website Visit and Feedback
description: Visit our website and provide feedback on user experience

proofRequirements.details: Provide detailed feedback on website navigation, design, and user experience (minimum 100 words)

title: Survey Completion
description: Complete a detailed survey about our products/services

proofRequirements.details: Submit survey completion confirmation code or screenshot

title: Content Like/Upvote
description: Like or upvote our content on various platforms

proofRequirements.details: Provide screenshots of your likes/upvotes on our content
Provide the email addresses or user IDs of referred users who have completed registration
